segments.text: Oh I fell over on the way to work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh I see . So that ’ s why you didn ’ t come in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes and I broke my phone too so I couldn ’ t call you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was ! But the worst thing was I tore my best shirt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh dear . Well , get well soon and try to be more careful in future .
segments.speaker: S1
